Mcginnity PSA 5.5 Piedmont 350--$300SOLD
Huggins(portrait) PSA 4  Cycle 350--$200 SOLD
Prices include delivery. Paypal ok.
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]

If interested in a trade I would like to trade for SGC graded cards, but I will 
consider all reasonable offers.
